title: Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Large Flowers", late 1960s
medium: Red and blue marking pen on semi-transparent paper
creditline: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
description: Beneath an arch-shaped line, a large four-petaled flower with seeds at lower right and two tulip-shaped flowers in blue at upper right; hatchings in red at upper and lower left.  This still-life appears to be viewed from above.  It is preliminary to the colored version 1993-121-80.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Woven Textile with Large Flowers", late 1960s.
late 1960s. Red and blue marking pen on semi-transparent paper. Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives. 1993-121-81.
